text: "Don't Break My Heart Again" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Pat Green. It was released in August 2004 as the first single from the album Lucky Ones. The song reached #21 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Green and Wade Bowen. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2004) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2004 singles Category:2004 songs Category:Pat Green songs Category:Song recordings produced by Don Gehman Category:Song recordings produced by Frank Rogers (record producer) Category:Show Dog-Universal Music singles Category:Songs written by Pat Green
title: Don't Break My Heart Again (Pat Green song)
